body:
Yes I have made a "fake leaving post"
And yes everyone thinks I am "looking for attention"
No I am not.
So I am here to say sorry.
I didn't realize 3/4 of this community would get pissed off and start harassing me in game.
I left for a total different reason other than looking for attention.
If you want to know why I left temporarily, add me on skype at aidanmorel.
I've realized MC is addicting, you guys don't have to agree that its addicting, (keep it to yourself) and MC is apart of me now.
Once again sorry.
